start.name: You
sentences: [SFX: Heartbeat (Distant, slightly echoing). Faint static hiss and wind.]

next_dia.name: You
sentences: (Sitting up slowly, eyes darting between the real and the dream) I'm awake... I can feel the sheets, the heat of the room... But the air is still thin, and the sky is the wrong color.

slight_smile.name: Lyra
sentences: (Translucent, sketching a half-real landscape) You found a tether. You anchored yourself to the threshold.

lyra_sorry.name: You
sentences: (Reaches out, hand passes through floating dream matter) I remember the hospital... I remember wanting to wake up. But every time I try to let go of this world, the fear pulls me back. It feels... safer here.

echo_said.name: Lyra
sentences: You exist in the compromise. The fracture is permanent.

touching_face.name: Lyra
sentences: What about the real world? What about... Lyra?

sfx.name: Lyra
sentences: (Voice softens, a rare moment of sadness) She is waiting by your side, trapped by the reality of your body.
And you are here, trapped by the reality of your mind.

whole_now.name: You
sentences: (Acceptance, despair, leaning back onto the hospital pillow) I can't choose. I guess... I guess I'll wait here, too.

ending.name: You
sentences: (Acceptance, despair, leaning back onto the hospital pillow) I can't choose. I guess... I guess I'll wait here, too.
